name: Cucumber Salad
description: Loaded with cherry tomatoes, red onions, chickpeas and more, with a bright, lemony flavor!

name: Lettuce with garlic
description: A healthy vegetables dish with light and refreshing taste.

name: Ma Po Tofu
description: A popular dish from Sichuan, offering you a special and spicy experience.

name: Peking Roasted Duck
description: A Beijing dish with roasted duck meat and crispy skin wrapped in a thin crepe.

name: Sweet Sour Pork
description: Cubed pork deep-fried until golden brown, then add sweet and sour sauce.

name: Sichuan Pork
description: Thin Sliced Pork Belly, Leek, Red Pepper, and Black Bean.

name: Seafood Congee
description: Seafood congee is made with a handful of shrimp, rich shrimp stock and the a couple of small crabs.

name: Red Bean Porridge
description: Made from dried red beans with added chewy rice cake balls made from glutinous rice flour. Creamy, nutty, and a little sweet

name: Mango Pomelo Sago
description: A Cantonese-style dessert with grapefruit, mango, sago, and coconut milk, and the main cooking process is boiling.

name: Fruit With Yogurt
description: Collision on the tip of the tongue brought by fruit and yogurt. You can also choose fruit yourself!

name: Fried Pork Dumplings
description: Filled with ground pork, napa cabbage, chives, soy sauce and more.

name: Pumpkin Pancake
description: A thin, flat, circular piece of cooked batter made from milk, pumpkin, flour, and eggs.

name: Rice Balls In Wine Soup
description: Small balls made of glutinous rice flour. Very chewy and slightly sweet.

name: Scallion Pancakes
description: A breakfast pancake with a lovely crispy shell and soft inside.

name: Chow Mein
description: A traditional Chinese dish made with egg noodles and stir-fried veggies
